name: Dominus 2
description: A free multiplayer strategy game. Grow in power by capturing castles. Climb the tree to become Dominus and win the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
